answers.answer: The coloring changing makes me think it may be a vascular problem. Do you have diabetes or have you been tested lately with a fasting glucose?here is a little site about tingling feet:http://rdoctor.com/symptoms_disease/content/view/112/2/

question: What does it mean when my feet turn purple, or red, and they feel numb? (they also get hot)
title: feet numbness
